field.label: Enable Automatic Execution
field.comment: Automatic execution of appropriate profiles after new order is placed (appropriate setting for a profile should be enabled)

field.label: Numeric columns to be integer
field.comment: Enter columns, which are numeric and should be integer after order export. You can find them in "Mapping" in "Field Mappings" tab in profile configuration. For example qty. Enter values on separate lines

field.label: Numeric columns to be rounded to 2 decimal points
field.comment: Enter columns, which are numeric and should be rounded to 2 decimal points after order export. You can find them in "Mapping" in "Field Mappings" tab in profile configuration. For example grand_total. Enter values on separate lines

field.label: Allow to run profile by direct URL
field.comment: This option can be useful when running profiles by cron (using wget for example) or with the help of the external software. The URL format to use is the following: http://yourmagentourl/amasty_orderexport/index/run/id/[profile_id]/sec/[code]/ , where [code] is the value specified in the next setting

field.label: Security code
field.comment: You should provide this code in the URL to run profile. If security code is empty, profile will not run! It is recommended to use combination of letters and digits, something about 10 symbols.
